casebody.data:
NORTH CAROLINA MEDICAL SOCIETY, North Carolina Society of Anesthesiologists, Inc., Eric W. Mason, M.D., and the North Carolina Medical Board f/k/a the Board of Medical Examiners of the State of North Carolina
v.
NORTH CAROLINA BOARD OF NURSING. No. 214P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Johnny M. Loper, John W. O'Tuel, III, Raleigh, Leighton P. Roper, III, Research Triangle Park, for NC Board of Nursing. Julian D. Bobbitt, Jr., Dana Simpson, Susan Hargrove, Raleigh, for NC Medical Society, et al. Thomas W. Mansfield, Marcus Jimison, Raleigh, for NC Medical Board.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of April 2005 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."
